thread.title: Lionel Messi makes Barcelona history with another sublime free-kick - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Lionel Messi makes Barcelona history with another sublime free-kick - Yahoo7

author: Aap On February
title: Lionel Messi makes Barcelona history with another sublime free-kick - Yahoo7
text:
Share Lionel Messi makes Barcelona history with another sublime free-kick - Yahoo7 La Liga champions Barcelona stayed on the heels of leaders Real Madrid by coasting to a 3-0 home win over Athletic Bilbao as Lionel Messi became the club's top scorer from free-kicks. Close VIDEO Messi's record-breaking free kick. Source: Bein Sports Messi's record-breaking free kick 
Paco Alcacer scored his first league goal since joining from Valencia last year by turning in a pass from Neymar in the 18th minute while Messi whipped in an angled strike in the 40th, his 27th goal from a free-kick for Barca. 
Aleix Vidal scored the most impressive goal of the game by finishing off an audacious solo run in the 67th minute. History for Messi. Image: Getty 
Luis Enrique made six changes to the team that beat Atletico Madrid 2-1 in Wednesday's King's Cup semi-final first leg, resting top scorer Luis Suarez, and it looked a risky move as Athletic made a bold start, although the hosts' quality soon shone through. 
Barca stayed second in the standings, moving one point behind Real Madrid but have played two games fewer than the leaders. 
Espanyol also collected three points with a 1-0 win over Malaga thanks to a 17th minute strike from Argentine attacker Pablo Piatti. Close Messi scores insane free kick for Barcelona UP NEXT
